pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python 3.4 include a ``WeakMethod`` class, for storing bound methods using weak references(see the `Python weakref module <http://docs.python.org/library/weakref.html>`_).This project is a backport of the WeakMethod class, and tests, for Python 2.6. The testsrequire the `unittest2 package <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/unittest2>`_.* Github repository & issue tracker: https://github.com/twang817/weakrefmethod
